name: Reverse (Josu Saez, joesre1, diazto, JC Ten)
name_original: Reverse (Josu Saez, joesre1, diazto, JC Ten)
description: A boy has awakend in unknown territory, a beautiful place filled with life. He quickly realises that he has lost his two dimentional orbs, so he starts to explore the world in order to find them. Suddenly, he finds some misterious shrines that allow him to travel to the dark dimension and go back to the light dimension again. Will his orbs be in the dark side?
